trans-unit.source: Create a custom StorSimple backup policy
trans-unit.target: Create a custom StorSimple backup policy

trans-unit.source: Explains how you can use the StorSimple Manager service to create a custom backup policy.
trans-unit.target: Explains how you can use the StorSimple Manager service to create a custom backup policy.

trans-unit.source: To create a custom backup policy
trans-unit.target: To create a custom backup policy

trans-unit.source: On the Devices page, click Backup Policies and then click Add.
trans-unit.target: On the Devices page, click Backup Policies and then click Add.

trans-unit.source: In the Add a backup policy dialog box, under Define your backup policy:
trans-unit.target: In the Add a backup policy dialog box, under Define your backup policy:

trans-unit.source: Specify a backup policy name.
trans-unit.target: Specify a backup policy name.

trans-unit.source: Select the volumes to be added to this policy.
trans-unit.target: Select the volumes to be added to this policy.

trans-unit.source: You can choose to add multiple volumes by selecting them from the drop-down list.
trans-unit.target: You can choose to add multiple volumes by selecting them from the drop-down list.

trans-unit.source: Click the check icon <linkText>check icon</linkText>.
trans-unit.target: Click the check icon <linkText>check icon</linkText>.

trans-unit.source: You will be notified after the policy is created successfully.
trans-unit.target: You will be notified after the policy is created successfully.

trans-unit.source: The backup policies page will also be updated to show the newly created policy.
trans-unit.target: The backup policies page will also be updated to show the newly created policy.

trans-unit.source: Click the policy name (first column) to drill down into details of the policy you just created.
trans-unit.target: Click the policy name (first column) to drill down into details of the policy you just created.

trans-unit.source: Click manage schedules.
trans-unit.target: Click manage schedules.

trans-unit.source: In the Manage Schedules dialog box:
trans-unit.target: In the Manage Schedules dialog box:

trans-unit.source: Select Create new to add another schedule.
trans-unit.target: Select Create new to add another schedule.

trans-unit.source: From the drop-down list, choose the backup type as local or cloud snapshot.
trans-unit.target: From the drop-down list, choose the backup type as local or cloud snapshot.

trans-unit.source: Specify the backup frequency in minutes, hours, days, or weeks.
trans-unit.target: Specify the backup frequency in minutes, hours, days, or weeks.

trans-unit.source: Select a retention.
trans-unit.target: Select a retention.

trans-unit.source: The retention choices depend on the backup frequency.
trans-unit.target: The retention choices depend on the backup frequency.

trans-unit.source: For instance, for a daily policy, the retention can be specified in weeks, whereas retention for a monthly policy is in months.
trans-unit.target: For instance, for a daily policy, the retention can be specified in weeks, whereas retention for a monthly policy is in months.

trans-unit.source: Select the starting time and date for the policy.
trans-unit.target: Select the starting time and date for the policy.

trans-unit.source: Select the check box to enable the policy.
trans-unit.target: Select the check box to enable the policy.

trans-unit.source: Click the check icon <linkText>check icon</linkText> to finish.
trans-unit.target: Click the check icon <linkText>check icon</linkText> to finish.

trans-unit.source: You will return to the policy details.
trans-unit.target: You will return to the policy details.

trans-unit.source: Click Save to save the changes you made to this policy.
trans-unit.target: Click Save to save the changes you made to this policy.

trans-unit.source: You will be notified when the policy has been saved.
trans-unit.target: You will be notified when the policy has been saved.

trans-unit.source: Navigate back to the Backup Policies page.
trans-unit.target: Navigate back to the Backup Policies page.

trans-unit.source: The tabular listing of the backup policies will be updated to display the modified policy.
trans-unit.target: The tabular listing of the backup policies will be updated to display the modified policy.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Custom backup policy</linkText>.
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Custom backup policy</linkText>.
